comments:

I did a lot of work on the Advanced Launcher tab back in August.  The problem 
that you're pointing out must have gotten fixed as a result.
Looking at the current code, I don't see a circumstance in which such a null 
pointer exception can be thrown.
Try the latest 2.1 integration build.
*** Bug 23394 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
